title: About Loot System
body:
Dear Dorito,

Please help me clarify certain things.
So loot system: Great fun and EZ skins.

However, I wanted to clarify certain things for my players in club and I need your help.
About Patch 7.12, is there any changes in loot chest system?
Everyone in my club is not getting any despite getting S+ on unmarked champs with 4 boxes stacked.

Secondly,
So a player was toxic(and yes I talked to him about respect and use of slur CAN and WILL incur the ban hammer of Dorito) and he was banned for 14days. So can he ever earn loot(His ban ended on MAY 28)?

Thanks for the help!
-Bansheenoir- (0ㅡ0)/ Hail ~~Hydra~~ Demacia(-ㅡ-)

replies.body:
Thanks for the feedback about the new mission system! I'm personally looking forward to seeing how it evolves over time and through future events. 

There weren't any major changes to how the usual loot systems work, just additions to it like tokens. Your club members might have already earned a chest for the champions they've been playing, keep in mind you can only get one chest for each champion each season.

As far as loot restrictions go, they will be lifted after showing consistent behavior improvement. This time period can be different for everyone, so just encourage them to stay positive and they'll be able to get loot again before too long!

Hey BROPORO,

Thanks for the reply!
Here are the images that might help you understand about the current situation.

https://ibb.co/gyZP8Q
https://ibb.co/d83vF5
https://ibb.co/bUH0hk
https://ibb.co/fV648Q
https://ibb.co/cXn0hk

So, most likely the reason you haven't received chests for those champions due to the fact that you're still currently ineligible for hextech loot. Anytime you receive a punishment you will be unable to get loot for a period of time until you've shown consistent reform. You can always reach out to our player behavior team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), or read up on [**Hextech Restrictions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209939463).
